Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Politically \Po*lit"i*cal*ly\, adv. 1. In a political manner. [1913 Webster]
2. Politicly; artfully. [Obs.] --Knolles. [1913 Webster]
politically adv 1: with regard to social relationships involving authority; "politically correct clothing" 2: with regard to government; "politically organized units"
